comments:
The snapshot context is filled in with all the sources without taking into account they can be null.  It will not accept null values.

PW

This effects Quick Access and the PDE Command Composer.  It can also effect Platform Text, although this is less likely.

The easiest way to cause this problem in I20070530-0010 is to try and bring up quick access with no editors open

PW

context snapshot v01

Don't add variables that are null
PW
I noticed that you added four more variables to the snapshot, for a total of 14, but there are 18 variable names.  This leads to two questions:

1. Can I not get a full snapshot of all 18 values?
2. Whoever is calling getContextSnapshot() now, could they be broken by adding four variables (ACTIVE_WORKBENCH_WINDOW_SHELL, ACTIVE_FOCUS_CONTROL_ID, ACTIVE_FOCUS_CONTROL, ACTIVE_SHELL), or would this fix a bug for them?
Created an attachment (id=69301)
context snapshot v02

The extra variables will only be provided to Quick Access (except for active shell, which was an oversight).

QuickAccess gets the full context including selection.
